document_data.name: Daraktan
document_data.mainbody: '''Orc''', also known as '''Orcish''' or '''Daraktan''',{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}} was the common language written and spoken by most [[orc]]s. Daraktan used the [[Dethek]] script.<ref>
document_data.History: Orc evolved from the archaic [[Hulgorkyn]] language used by the orcs.

Orc names.Given names:
*Male: Besk, Durth, Fang, Gothog, Harl, Kesk, Orrusk, Tharag, Thog, Ugurth  
*Female: Betharra, Creske, Edarreske, Duvaega, Neske, Orvaega, Varra, Yeskarra
Orc names.Surnames: *Dummik, Horthor, Lammar, Sormuzhik, Turnskull, Ulkrunnar, Zorgar
